metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9923 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Quick Emulator (Qemu) built with the 'chardev' backend support is vulnerable to a use after free issue. It could occur while hotplug and unplugging the device in the guest. A guest user/process could use this flaw to crash a Qemu process on the host resulting in DoS.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> complex backport, we're not going to dix this in xenial and older

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
